data.name: Email_Verification_List
data.queryText:
select 
EMAIL_ADDRESS as EMAIL
From {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/451f8d43-a629-ef11-ba55-d4f5ef3de438/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/451f8d43-a629-ef11-ba55-d4f5ef3de438/data/name}}] A
where not exists (SELECT 1 FROM {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/8204b904-032d-ef11-ba55-d4f5ef3de438/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/8204b904-032d-ef11-ba55-d4f5ef3de438/data/name}}] V 
                  WHERE A.EMAIL_ADDRESS = V.EMAIL)
group by EMAIL_ADDRESS

data.name: Email_Validation_Usage
Email Verification Update
Email Verification Request
